name: String
description: Display and Auto-translate text into the app's current user language

name: Row
description: Use responsive `row` and `col` as marko-tag. Depend on `WSAdapt` component to work in multipple space

name: Select
description: Cool select input with smooth dropdown. Inspired by select2

name: Image
description: Image with lazy load and effect as marko-tag

name: WSAdapt
description: Component to handle responsiveness base on multipple's workspace dynanism

name: Preloader
description: Display loading icon during an ongoing process

name: RouterWrapper
description: Handle routing component as navigation pages

name: DialogModal
description: Nice popup dialog to alert or for confirmation process. Depend on `WSAdapt` component to work.

name: PosterPlus
description: Select and upload file from your computer to the cloud/application

name: Button
description: Nice shape bootstrap button with active, sort, ... functions

name: FormAlert
description: Nice form alert display base on bootstrap alert style and variations

name: MiniRouter
description: Simple and Smooth marko-component level routing
